ForgotPasswordMailTemplate.Subject: Reset Password
ForgotPasswordMailTemplate.Body:
Dear #RecipientName,

Please use the OTP to complete your online request to reset password.

OTP

#OTP

Note: This email is automatically generated by TSCOD Web Admin. The mailbox is unmonitored. For inquiries, contact your District Coordinator.

Regards,

Admin

RegistrationSamplingSMS.SMSAPILink: http://api.smscountry.com/SMSCwebservice_bulk.aspx?User=TSCODProgram&passwd=23812000&mobilenumber=#MobileNo&message=Dear #SubjectName, Your enrolment in the TSCOD Program is completed successfully. Your  sample ID is - #SubjectId. For details, contact #ANMName #ANMMobile

ErrorBarcodeSMSEmail.ErrorBarcodeToANM: http://api.smscountry.com/SMSCwebservice_bulk.aspx?User=TSCODProgram&passwd=23812000&mobilenumber=#ANMMobileNo&message=Hi #ANMName! Barcode #Barcode (#SubjectName, #SubjectId) has already been entered by #ExistANMName (SC-#ExistANMSCName).Contact your DC and initiate a change request
ErrorBarcodeSMSEmail.ErrorBarcodeToExistANM: http://api.smscountry.com/SMSCwebservice_bulk.aspx?User=TSCODProgram&passwd=23812000&mobilenumber=#ExistANMMobileNo&message=Hi #ExistANMName! Barcode #Barcode (#ExistSubjectName, #ExistSubjectId) has been entered by #ANMName (SC-#ANMSCName).Please recheck your barcode entry and report to DC
ErrorBarcodeSMSEmail.ErrorBarcodeToDCSPC: http://api.smscountry.com/SMSCwebservice_bulk.aspx?User=TSCODProgram&passwd=23812000&mobilenumber=#MobileNo&message=Hi #SPCDCName, Dup Barcode-#Barcode entered by #ANMName, (#SubjectName-#SubjectId) & #ExistANMName, (#ExistSubjectName-#ExistSubjectId). Pl cont ADMIN immediately
ErrorBarcodeSMSEmail.MailSubject: Error Notification - BARCODE DUPLICATED #Barcode Needs your Immediate attention and resolution !
ErrorBarcodeSMSEmail.Body:
Hello all,

A case of DUPLICATE BARCODE entry has been identified by the system. Needs your immediate attention and resolution . You are advised to map the correct Barcode to the appropriate Subject.

Please extract the barcode from the stickers stuck in the manual registers sent by the ANM to the CHCs.

Please use the barcode scanner to avoid any manual errors again.

Duplicate Barcode : #Barcode. Following subjects have been mapped with the same barcode.

Sub NameSub IDRegn DateSample Coll.DateANM NameANM MobileCHCPHCDC NameDC Mobile
First Entry#ExistSubjectName#ExistSubjectId#ExistRegDate#ExistSampleCollectionDate#ExistANMName#ExistANMMobileNo#ExistCHC#ExistPHC#ExistDCName#ExistDCContactNo
Latest Entry#SubjectName#SubjectId#RegDate#SampleCollectionDate#ANMName#ANMMobileNo#CHC#PHC#DCName#DCContactNo

Please work with the Administrator to correct the error in the Error Correction Module in the DMS system with due approvals.

PLEASE ASK THE RESPECTIVE ANMs TO LOG OFF, SO THAT THE ADMIN CAN CORRECT THE ERROR BARCODES. THE ANMS CAN RELOGIN AFTER CORRECTION SO THAT THE MODIFIED ERROR CODES SYNC UP TO THEIR TABLETS.

Regards,

TSCOD SYSADMIN

BarcodeUpdationEmail.ExistMailSubject: Barcode change request  completed :  Barcode #OldBarcodeNo1 has been changed to #NewBarcodeNo1  and Barcode #OldBarcodeNo2 has been changed to #NewBarcodeNo2
BarcodeUpdationEmail.MailSubject: Barcode change request  completed :  Barcode #OldBarcodeNo has been changed to #NewBarcodeNo
BarcodeUpdationEmail.BarcodeBody:
Dear DC,

Request for Barcode change has been completed as follows :

Sub NameSub IDANM NameANM MobileDC NameDC MobileOld BarcodeRevised Barcode
#SubjectName#SubjectId#ANMName#ANMMobile#DCName#DCMobile#OldBarcode#RevisedBarcode

Regards,

TSCOD SYSADMIN
BarcodeUpdationEmail.ExistBarcodeBody:
Dear DCs,

Request for Barcode change has been completed.

The revised barcode proposed by you already exists and has been overwritten as per your request.

The incorrect barcode, if any, will be suffixed with ' -ERR ' and will appear under the revised barcode column in the table below.

The corresponding DC should identify the actual barcode and initiate a change request to the admin.

Sub NameSub IDANM NameANM MobileDC NameDC MobileOld BarcodeRevised Barcode
#SubjectName1#SubjectId1#ANMName1#ANMMobile1#DCName1#DCMobile1#OldBarcode1#RevisedBarcode1
#SubjectName2#SubjectId2#ANMName2#ANMMobile2#DCName2#DCMobile2#OldBarcode2#RevisedBarcode2

Regards,

TSCOD SYSADMIN

RCHUpdationEmail.ExistRCHBody:
Dear DCs,

Request for RCH ID change has been completed.

The revised RCH ID proposed by you already exists and has been overwritten as per your request.

The incorrect RCH ID, if any, will be suffixed with ' -ERR ' and will appear under the revised RCH ID column in the table below.

The corresponding DC should identify the actual RCHID and initiate a change request to the admin.

Sub NameSub IDANM NameANM MobileDC NameDC MobileOld RCHIDRevised RCHID
#SubjectName1#SubjectId1#ANMName1#ANMMobile1#DCName1#DCMobile1#OldRCHID1#RevisedRCHID1
#SubjectName2#SubjectId2#ANMName2#ANMMobile2#DCName2#DCMobile2#OldRCHID2#RevisedRCHID2

Regards,

TSCOD SYSADMIN
